5.1: Relate Pounds to People

Each person gets ______ pound(s) of blueberries. More than 1 Exactly 1 Less than 1 \( \frac{1}{2} \)
_______ people share 7 pounds of blueberries
_______ people share ______ pounds of blueberries
Three people share ______ pounds of blueberries
_______ people share ______ pounds of blueberries
  1. Fill in the blanks to match the rules in the table.
  2. How many pounds of blueberries did each person get when they got more than 1 pound of blueberries?
  3. How many pounds of blueberries did each person get when they got less than 1 pound of blueberries?
